attributes.action: Reverse the government's ban on the use of anti-capitalist material in teaching
attributes.additional_details:
This is academic censorship on political grounds. It doesn't align with the values of a free and democratic society, and shouldn't have a place as part of the policy of a democracy like Britain which depends on a free and educated populace.

It affects the diversity of ideas in education and limits the education of students in several subjects, e.g, History, Politics, Sociology, etc.
attributes.background: The government has ordered schools in England not to use resources from anti-capitalist organisations, categorised anti-capitalism as an “extreme political stance” and equated it with opposition to freedom of speech, antisemitism and endorsement of illegal activity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552627
